contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|quarto}} '''''Quarto''''' ([[Latin]] and [[Italian language|Italian]] for "fourth") could refer to: * [[Quarto]], a size or format of a book in which four leaves of a book are created from a standard size sheet of paper * For specific information about quarto texts of [[William Shakespeare]]'s works, see: **[[Folios and Quartos (Shakespeare)|Folios and Quartos]] **[[Bad quarto]] * [[Quarto (board game)|Quarto]], a board game * Quarto, a coin worth {{Frac|24}} of a [[Gibraltarian real]] * [[Quarto Group]], a London-based publishing house ==Places of Italy== * [[Quarto, Campania|Quarto]], a municipality in the Province of Naples * [[Quarto d'Altino]], a municipality in the Province of Treviso * [[Quarto d'Asti]], an hamlet of [[Asti]] (AT) * [[Quarto Cagnino]], a quarter of [[Milan]] * [[Quarto Chilometro]], an hamlet of [[Colleferro]] (RM) * [[Quarto Oggiaro]], a quarter of Milan * [[Quarto dei Mille]], a quarter of [[Genoa]] * [[Quartu Sant'Elena]], a municipality in the Province of Cagliari {{disambig}}
